title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama. Chat, embed, or run any model with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama. Works in Node, Bun, Deno, and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings, or tool-calling agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’). Features workspaces, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Kotlin coroutines support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with syntax highlighting & history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion agent inside VS Code.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight Retrieval-Augmented Generation plugin for Ollama WebUI using Chroma/Qdrant.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node that lets you call any Ollama model inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client for Ollama with strongly-typed requests and streaming chat support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with generated types and streaming support.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Curated list of community-created Modelfiles for niche domains (finance, medicine, RPG).

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into your server with slash commands.

title: ollama-sd-webui
summary: Extension for AUTOMATIC1111 Stable-Diffusion-WebUI that uses Ollama for prompt generation.

title: ollama-rf-robot
summary: Robot Framework library to run local LLM assertions and synthetic test data generation via Ollama.
